moduleObjectives: Understand the specialized applications of robotics in specific industries.
Learn about the use of robotics in manufacturing, healthcare, agriculture, and service and retail sectors.
Explore the challenges and opportunities in these industries.
Gain insights into the future trends and advancements in industry-specific robotics.

modules.title: Chapter 4: Robotics in Service and Retail

additionalResources.textbookTitle: Artificial Intelligence in Robotics: Transforming the Future
